group_1.textLeft: Damnit!
What's her problem, anyway?!

group_1.textRight: Are you talking about Nanaka Tokiwa?

group_1.textLeft: Who else would I be talkin' about!@I even took out that Witch for her, too![chara:100501:effect_emotion_angry_1][se:7218_anger]
Unbelievable!
...Oh NOOO![chara:100501:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]
I forgot to collect my reward...

group_1.textRight: Then you should go get it.

group_1.textLeft: I can't go back now!@[chara:100501:effect_emotion_sad_0][se:7224_fall_into]Not after that fight...

group_1.textRight: Ah yes, "saving face."@You humans have a lot of bothersome rules.

group_1.textLeft: Urgh...@I'm pretty much broke...
I won't be able to buy@a nice, big meal like this...

group_1.textRight: Then go get some money and food.

group_1.textLeft: I was tryin' to do that...

group_1.textRight: Get it from somewhere there's a lot of both.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:100501:effect_emotion_angry_0][se:7219_strain]I told ya a million times!
I'm not gonna steal stuff, okay?!
I'm just not!

group_1.textRight: Though you will put me in@a difficult spot if you die.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, yeah, I get it!@I'll look for another job!
That said, where should I even look?
I guess I could just go around helpin'@Magical Girls fight Witches for cash...
...[freeze:1.0][chara:100501:lipSynch_1][chara:100501:cheek_0][chara:100501:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json][chara:100501:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Wait...
Magical Girls are out there@lookin' for Witches, right?
Where there are Witches,@there are Magical Girls!
That's it!
Magical Girls are sure to show up@wherever there might be Witches!
And they'll be tryin' to fight them, too!
This might make for some good business...

group_1.textRight: ...So you're just going to @look for other Magical Girls?

group_1.textLeft: Pretty much!@All right, I'm off!
